heading: HR00322
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT (DSWD), DEPARTMENT OF THE INTERIOR AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT (DILG), DEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL DEFENSE (DND), DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, (DOTR), AND THE DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL RESOURCES (DENR), IN COORDINATION WITH THE NATIONAL FOOD AUTHORITY (NFA) AND THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (DA), TO DIRECTLY BUY BACK PALAY OF THE LOCAL FARMERS FOR THE RICE SUBSIDY PROGRAM
principal-authors: ROMUALDEZ, YEDDA MARIE K.; ROMUALDEZ, FERDINAND MARTIN G.;
mother-bill statusstatus: House requested for a conference committee on 2019-11-12 Substituted by HJR0022
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00322
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT (DSWD), DEPARTMENT OF THE INTERIOR AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT (DILG), DEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL DEFENSE (DND), DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, (DOTR), AND THE DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL RESOURCES (DENR), IN COORDINATION WITH THE NATIONAL FOOD AUTHORITY (NFA) AND THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (DA), TO DIRECTLY BUY BACK PALAY OF THE LOCAL FARMERS FOR THE RICE SUBSIDY PROGRAM
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROMUALDEZ, YEDDA MARIE K., ROMUALDEZ, FERDINAND MARTIN G.
DATE FILED : 2019-09-12
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Garbin (000 2019-09-12)2. Sangcopan (000 2020-01-28)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-10-01
          -The Committee suspended deliberation on HBs 16 and 322 and directed the Secretariat to invite concerned government agencies to attend on the next committee hearing.
      2. Measure approved by the Committee on 2019-10-23
          -The proposed substitute house joint resolution was approved and the Secretariat was directed to prepare the Committee Report of the same.
MOTHER BILL: HJR0022
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2019-09-13
